subject: Olympic Games (2010)
Skeleton (Sport)
Bobsledding
Accidents and Safety
Luge Racing
lead_paragraph: The death of Nodar Kumaritashvili prompted changes to the luge event, but no such changes will be made for skeleton and bobsled events, which will be held on the same track.
snippet: The death of Nodar Kumaritashvili prompted changes to the luge event, but no such changes will be made for skeleton and bobsled events, which will be held on the same track.
